Description.Text: An excellent standard of hotel. Renowned for it long-standing presence in Perth, and central location the hotel offers a fantastic base from which to explore the surrounding countryside. Attractions nearby include Scone Palace, Perth racecourse, Glenturret distillery and Balgonie Castle. (KB 04/08)

Located in the heart of Perth, adjacent to the station. With its own beautiful landscaped gardens the hotel provides a perfect mix of a centrally located hotel with a chance to relax and enjoy stunning gardens. Just minutes from the M90, Perth provides excellent access to Glasgow and Edinburgh within an hour drive and Aberdeen in less than two hours. Perth is situated on the River Tay, and is one of the country's most attractive areas. Once the capital of Scotland, Perth has a multitude of interesting and exciting places to visit. The Quality Hotel Perth, is situated at the gateway to the Highland's panoramic views, scenic walks and tourist attractions such as stately homes and distilleries.

Recently refurbished rooms offer modern and comfortable accommodation. All rooms are ensuite with bath and shower facilities and include satellite television, tea and coffee making facilities as well as WiFi access in each of the rooms. Rooms vary in size, due to the historic nature of the building but are generally of a medium/large size with high ceilings and large windows to enjoy views across the city or hotel gardens. All rooms are of a good standard and decorated in a modern style with warming reds & neutral creams.

A beautiful Victorian mansion house hotel, typical and traditional of the late Scottish station hotels. Set across 3 floors the hotel also offers car parking for guests and coach parking for larger groups.

The 'Harling Restaurant' serves full Scottish breakfast, lunch & dinner, with a choice of à la carte & table d’hotel menus accompanied by an extensive wine list. For a more relaxed environment, the Garden bar offers light snacks, bar meals and drinks, accompanied by views across the hotel's 2 acre gardens.
The lobby is of a medium size with a seating area for guests. The hotel offers a warm welcome to all guests arriving.
